00049 /***************************************************************************/
00062 void LCD_Init(const LCD_Init_TypeDef *lcdInit)
00063 {
00064   uint32_t dispCtrl = LCD->DISPCTRL;
00065 
00066   EFM_ASSERT(lcdInit != (void *) 0);
00067 
00068   /* Disable controller before reconfiguration */
00069   LCD_Enable(false);
00070 
00071   /* Make sure we don't touch other bit fields (i.e. voltage boost) */
00072   dispCtrl &= ~(0
00073 #if defined(LCD_DISPCTRL_MUXE)
00074                 | _LCD_DISPCTRL_MUXE_MASK
00075 #endif
00076                 | _LCD_DISPCTRL_MUX_MASK
00077                 | _LCD_DISPCTRL_BIAS_MASK
00078                 | _LCD_DISPCTRL_WAVE_MASK
00079                 | _LCD_DISPCTRL_VLCDSEL_MASK
00080                 | _LCD_DISPCTRL_CONCONF_MASK);
00081 
00082   /* Configure controller according to initialization structure */
00083   dispCtrl |= lcdInit->mux; /* also configures MUXE */
00084   dispCtrl |= lcdInit->bias;
00085   dispCtrl |= lcdInit->wave;
00086   dispCtrl |= lcdInit->vlcd;
00087   dispCtrl |= lcdInit->contrast;
00088 
00089   /* Update display controller */
00090   LCD->DISPCTRL = dispCtrl;
00091 
00092   /* Enable controller if wanted */
00093   if (lcdInit->enable)
00094   {
00095     LCD_Enable(true);
00096   }
00097 }

00100 /***************************************************************************/
00107 void LCD_VLCDSelect(LCD_VLCDSel_TypeDef vlcd)
00108 {
00109   uint32_t dispctrl = LCD->DISPCTRL;
00110 
00111   /* Select VEXT or VDD */
00112   dispctrl &= ~_LCD_DISPCTRL_VLCDSEL_MASK;
00113   switch (vlcd)
00114   {
00115     case lcdVLCDSelVExtBoost:
00116       dispctrl |= LCD_DISPCTRL_VLCDSEL_VEXTBOOST;
00117       break;
00118     case lcdVLCDSelVDD:
00119       dispctrl |= LCD_DISPCTRL_VLCDSEL_VDD;
00120       break;
00121     default:
00122       break;
00123   }
00124 
00125   LCD->DISPCTRL = dispctrl;
00126 }

00129 /***************************************************************************/
00136 void LCD_UpdateCtrl(LCD_UpdateCtrl_TypeDef ud)
00137 {
00138   LCD->CTRL = (LCD->CTRL & ~_LCD_CTRL_UDCTRL_MASK) | ud;
00139 }

00142 /***************************************************************************/
00149 void LCD_FrameCountInit(const LCD_FrameCountInit_TypeDef *fcInit)
00150 {
00151   uint32_t bactrl = LCD->BACTRL;
00152 
00153   EFM_ASSERT(fcInit != (void *) 0);
00154 
00155   /* Verify FC Top Counter to be within limits */
00156   EFM_ASSERT(fcInit->top < 64);
00157 
00158   /* Reconfigure frame count configuration */
00159   bactrl &= ~(_LCD_BACTRL_FCTOP_MASK
00160               | _LCD_BACTRL_FCPRESC_MASK);
00161   bactrl |= (fcInit->top << _LCD_BACTRL_FCTOP_SHIFT);
00162   bactrl |= fcInit->prescale;
00163 
00164   /* Set Blink and Animation Control Register */
00165   LCD->BACTRL = bactrl;
00166 
00167   LCD_FrameCountEnable(fcInit->enable);
00168 }
00169

00171 /***************************************************************************/
00178 void LCD_AnimInit(const LCD_AnimInit_TypeDef *animInit)
00179 {
00180   uint32_t bactrl = LCD->BACTRL;
00181 
00182   EFM_ASSERT(animInit != (void *) 0);
00183 
00184   /* Set Animation Register Values */
00185   LCD->AREGA = animInit->AReg;
00186   LCD->AREGB = animInit->BReg;
00187 
00188   /* Configure Animation Shift and Logic */
00189   bactrl &= ~(_LCD_BACTRL_AREGASC_MASK
00190               | _LCD_BACTRL_AREGBSC_MASK
00191               | _LCD_BACTRL_ALOGSEL_MASK);
00192 
00193   bactrl |= (animInit->AShift << _LCD_BACTRL_AREGASC_SHIFT);
00194   bactrl |= (animInit->BShift << _LCD_BACTRL_AREGBSC_SHIFT);
00195   bactrl |= animInit->animLogic;
00196 
00197 #if defined(LCD_BACTRL_ALOC)
00198   bactrl &= ~(_LCD_BACTRL_ALOC_MASK);
00199 
00200   if(animInit->startSeg == 0)
00201   {
00202     bactrl |= LCD_BACTRL_ALOC_SEG0TO7;
00203   }
00204   else if(animInit->startSeg == 8)
00205   {
00206     bactrl |= LCD_BACTRL_ALOC_SEG8TO15;
00207   }
00208 #endif
00209 
00210   /* Reconfigure */
00211   LCD->BACTRL = bactrl;
00212 
00213   /* Enable */
00214   LCD_AnimEnable(animInit->enable);
00215 }

00229 void LCD_SegmentRangeEnable(LCD_SegmentRange_TypeDef segmentRange, bool enable)
00230 {
00231   if (enable)
00232   {
00233     LCD->SEGEN |= segmentRange;
00234   }
00235   else
00236   {
00237     LCD->SEGEN &= ~((uint32_t)segmentRange);
00238   }
00239 }

00242 /***************************************************************************/
00260 void LCD_SegmentSet(int com, int bit, bool enable)
00261 {
00262 #if defined(_LCD_SEGD7L_MASK)
00263   /* Tiny and Giant Family supports up to 8 COM lines */
00264   EFM_ASSERT(com < 8);
00265 #else
00266   /* Gecko Family supports up to 4 COM lines */
00267   EFM_ASSERT(com < 4);
00268 #endif
00269 
00270 #if defined(_LCD_SEGD0H_MASK)
00271   EFM_ASSERT(bit < 40);
00272 #else
00273   /* Tiny Gecko Family supports only "low" segment registers */
00274   EFM_ASSERT(bit < 32);
00275 #endif
00276 
00277   /* Use bitband access for atomic bit set/clear of segment */
00278   switch (com)
00279   {
00280     case 0:
00281       if (bit < 32)
00282       {
00283         BUS_RegBitWrite(&(LCD->SEGD0L), bit, enable);
00284       }
00285 #if defined(_LCD_SEGD0H_MASK)
00286       else
00287       {
00288         bit -= 32;
00289         BUS_RegBitWrite(&(LCD->SEGD0H), bit, enable);
00290       }
00291 #endif
00292       break;
00293     case 1:
00294       if (bit < 32)
00295       {
00296         BUS_RegBitWrite(&(LCD->SEGD1L), bit, enable);
00297       }
00298 #if defined(_LCD_SEGD1H_MASK)
00299       else
00300       {
00301         bit -= 32;
00302         BUS_RegBitWrite(&(LCD->SEGD1H), bit, enable);
00303       }
00304 #endif
00305       break;
00306     case 2:
00307       if (bit < 32)
00308       {
00309         BUS_RegBitWrite(&(LCD->SEGD2L), bit, enable);
00310       }
00311 #if defined(_LCD_SEGD2H_MASK)
00312       else
00313       {
00314         bit -= 32;
00315         BUS_RegBitWrite(&(LCD->SEGD2H), bit, enable);
00316       }
00317 #endif
00318       break;
00319     case 3:
00320       if (bit < 32)
00321       {
00322         BUS_RegBitWrite(&(LCD->SEGD3L), bit, enable);
00323       }
00324 #if defined(_LCD_SEGD3H_MASK)
00325       else
00326       {
00327         bit -= 32;
00328         BUS_RegBitWrite(&(LCD->SEGD3H), bit, enable);
00329       }
00330 #endif
00331       break;
00332 #if defined(_LCD_SEGD4L_MASK)
00333     case 4:
00334       if (bit < 32)
00335       {
00336         BUS_RegBitWrite(&(LCD->SEGD4L), bit, enable);
00337       }
00338 #if defined(_LCD_SEGD4H_MASK)
00339       else
00340       {
00341         bit -= 32;
00342         BUS_RegBitWrite(&(LCD->SEGD4H), bit, enable);
00343       }
00344 #endif
00345       break;
00346 #endif
00347 #if defined(_LCD_SEGD5L_MASK)
00348     case 5:
00349       if (bit < 32)
00350       {
00351         BUS_RegBitWrite(&(LCD->SEGD5L), bit, enable);
00352       }
00353 #if defined(_LCD_SEGD5H_MASK)
00354       else
00355       {
00356         bit -= 32;
00357         BUS_RegBitWrite(&(LCD->SEGD5H), bit, enable);
00358       }
00359 #endif
00360       break;
00361 #endif
00362     case 6:
00363 #if defined(_LCD_SEGD6L_MASK)
00364       if (bit < 32)
00365       {
00366         BUS_RegBitWrite(&(LCD->SEGD6L), bit, enable);
00367       }
00368 #if defined(_LCD_SEGD6H_MASK)
00369       else
00370       {
00371         bit -= 32;
00372         BUS_RegBitWrite(&(LCD->SEGD6H), bit, enable);
00373       }
00374 #endif
00375       break;
00376 #endif
00377 #if defined(_LCD_SEGD7L_MASK)
00378     case 7:
00379       if (bit < 32)
00380       {
00381         BUS_RegBitWrite(&(LCD->SEGD7L), bit, enable);
00382       }
00383 #if defined(_LCD_SEGD7H_MASK)
00384       else
00385       {
00386         bit -= 32;
00387         BUS_RegBitWrite(&(LCD->SEGD7H), bit, enable);
00388       }
00389 #endif
00390       break;
00391 #endif
00392 
00393     default:
00394       EFM_ASSERT(0);
00395       break;
00396   }
00397 }

00400 /***************************************************************************/
00414 void LCD_SegmentSetLow(int com, uint32_t mask, uint32_t bits)
00415 {
00416   uint32_t segData;
00417 
00418   /* Maximum number of com lines */
00419 #if defined(_LCD_SEGD7L_MASK)
00420   EFM_ASSERT(com < 8);
00421 #else
00422   /* Gecko Family supports up to 4 COM lines */
00423   EFM_ASSERT(com < 4);
00424 #endif
00425 
00426   switch (com)
00427   {
00428     case 0:
00429       segData     = LCD->SEGD0L;
00430       segData    &= ~(mask);
00431       segData    |= (mask & bits);
00432       LCD->SEGD0L = segData;
00433       break;
00434     case 1:
00435       segData     = LCD->SEGD1L;
00436       segData    &= ~(mask);
00437       segData    |= (mask & bits);
00438       LCD->SEGD1L = segData;
00439       break;
00440     case 2:
00441       segData     = LCD->SEGD2L;
00442       segData    &= ~(mask);
00443       segData    |= (mask & bits);
00444       LCD->SEGD2L = segData;
00445       break;
00446     case 3:
00447       segData     = LCD->SEGD3L;
00448       segData    &= ~(mask);
00449       segData    |= (mask & bits);
00450       LCD->SEGD3L = segData;
00451       break;
00452 #if defined(_LCD_SEGD4L_MASK)
00453     case 4:
00454       segData     = LCD->SEGD4L;
00455       segData    &= ~(mask);
00456       segData    |= (mask & bits);
00457       LCD->SEGD4L = segData;
00458       break;
00459 #endif
00460 #if defined(_LCD_SEGD5L_MASK)
00461     case 5:
00462       segData     = LCD->SEGD5L;
00463       segData    &= ~(mask);
00464       segData    |= (mask & bits);
00465       LCD->SEGD5L = segData;
00466       break;
00467 #endif
00468 #if defined(_LCD_SEGD6L_MASK)
00469     case 6:
00470       segData     = LCD->SEGD6L;
00471       segData    &= ~(mask);
00472       segData    |= (mask & bits);
00473       LCD->SEGD6L = segData;
00474       break;
00475 #endif
00476 #if defined(_LCD_SEGD7L_MASK)
00477     case 7:
00478       segData     = LCD->SEGD7L;
00479       segData    &= ~(mask);
00480       segData    |= (mask & bits);
00481       LCD->SEGD7L = segData;
00482       break;
00483 #endif
00484     default:
00485       EFM_ASSERT(0);
00486       break;
00487   }
00488 }

00505 void LCD_SegmentSetHigh(int com, uint32_t mask, uint32_t bits)
00506 {
00507   uint32_t segData;
00508 
00509 #if defined(_LCD_SEGD7H_MASK)
00510   EFM_ASSERT(com < 8);
00511 #else
00512   EFM_ASSERT(com < 4);
00513 #endif
00514 
00515   /* Maximum number of com lines */
00516   switch (com)
00517   {
00518     case 0:
00519       segData     = LCD->SEGD0H;
00520       segData    &= ~(mask);
00521       segData    |= (mask & bits);
00522       LCD->SEGD0H = segData;
00523       break;
00524     case 1:
00525       segData     = LCD->SEGD1H;
00526       segData    &= ~(mask);
00527       segData    |= (mask & bits);
00528       LCD->SEGD1H = segData;
00529       break;
00530     case 2:
00531       segData     = LCD->SEGD2H;
00532       segData    &= ~(mask);
00533       segData    |= (mask & bits);
00534       LCD->SEGD2H = segData;
00535       break;
00536     case 3:
00537       segData     = LCD->SEGD3H;
00538       segData    &= ~(mask);
00539       segData    |= (mask & bits);
00540       LCD->SEGD3H = segData;
00541       break;

00544       segData     = LCD->SEGD4H;
00545       segData    &= ~(mask);

00547       LCD->SEGD4H = segData;
00548       break;
00549 #endif

00580 /***************************************************************************/
00587 void LCD_ContrastSet(int level)
00588 {
00589   EFM_ASSERT(level < 32);
00590 
00591   LCD->DISPCTRL = (LCD->DISPCTRL & ~_LCD_DISPCTRL_CONLEV_MASK)
00592                   | (level << _LCD_DISPCTRL_CONLEV_SHIFT);
00593 }

00596 /***************************************************************************/
00605 void LCD_VBoostSet(LCD_VBoostLevel_TypeDef vboost)
00606 {
00607   /* Reconfigure Voltage Boost */
00608   LCD->DISPCTRL = (LCD->DISPCTRL & ~_LCD_DISPCTRL_VBLEV_MASK) | vboost;
00609 }

00612 #if defined(LCD_CTRL_DSC)
00613 /***************************************************************************/
00632 void LCD_BiasSegmentSet(int segmentLine, int biasLevel)
00633 {
00634   int               biasRegister;
00635   int               bitShift;
00636   volatile uint32_t *segmentRegister;
00637 
00638 #if !defined(_LCD_SEGD0H_MASK)
00639   EFM_ASSERT(segmentLine < 20);
00640 
00641   /* Bias config for 8 segment lines per SEGDnL register */
00642   biasRegister = segmentLine / 8;
00643   bitShift     = (segmentLine % 8) * 4;
00644 
00645   switch (biasRegister)
00646   {
00647     case 0:
00648       segmentRegister = &LCD->SEGD0L;
00649       break;
00650     case 1:
00651       segmentRegister = &LCD->SEGD1L;
00652       break;
00653     case 2:
00654       segmentRegister = &LCD->SEGD2L;
00655       break;
00656     case 3:
00657       segmentRegister = &LCD->SEGD3L;
00658       break;
00659     default:
00660       segmentRegister = (uint32_t *)0x00000000;
00661       EFM_ASSERT(0);
00662       break;
00663   }
00664 #else
00665   EFM_ASSERT(segmentLine < 40);
00666 
00667   /* Bias config for 10 segment lines per SEGDn L+H registers */
00668   biasRegister = segmentLine / 10;
00669   bitShift     = (segmentLine % 10) * 4;
00670 
00671   switch (biasRegister)
00672   {
00673     case 0:
00674       if (bitShift < 32)
00675       {
00676         segmentRegister = &LCD->SEGD0L;
00677       }
00678       else
00679       {
00680         segmentRegister = &LCD->SEGD0H;
00681         bitShift       -= 32;
00682       }
00683       break;
00684     case 1:
00685       if (bitShift < 32)
00686       {
00687         segmentRegister = &LCD->SEGD1L;
00688       }
00689       else
00690       {
00691         segmentRegister = &LCD->SEGD1H;
00692         bitShift       -= 32;
00693       }
00694       break;
00695     case 2:
00696       if (bitShift < 32)
00697       {
00698         segmentRegister = &LCD->SEGD2L;
00699       }
00700       else
00701       {
00702         segmentRegister = &LCD->SEGD1H;
00703         bitShift       -= 32;
00704       }
00705       break;
00706     case 3:
00707       if (bitShift < 32)
00708       {
00709         segmentRegister = &LCD->SEGD3L;
00710       }
00711       else
00712       {
00713         segmentRegister = &LCD->SEGD3H;
00714         bitShift       -= 32;
00715       }
00716       break;
00717     default:
00718       segmentRegister = (uint32_t *)0x00000000;
00719       EFM_ASSERT(0);
00720       break;
00721   }
00722 #endif
00723 
00724   /* Configure new bias setting */
00725   *segmentRegister = (*segmentRegister & ~(0xF << bitShift)) | (biasLevel << bitShift);
00726 }
00727 #endif
00728

00730 #if defined(LCD_CTRL_DSC)
00731 /***************************************************************************/
00750 void LCD_BiasComSet(int comLine, int biasLevel)
00751 {
00752   int bitShift;
00753   EFM_ASSERT(comLine < 8);
00754 
00755   bitShift    = comLine * 4;
00756   LCD->SEGD4L = (LCD->SEGD4L & ~(0xF << bitShift)) | (biasLevel << bitShift);
00757 }
00758 #endif
